content.question: Which of the following describes the data in the graph?

choices.label: The largest decrease in household disposable income occurred between 2004 and 2005.
The largest decrease in household savings occurred between 2009 and 2010.
The largest increase in household disposable income occurred between 2008 and 2009.
The largest increase in household disposable income occurred between 2013 and 2014.

content.answer: The largest increase in household disposable income occurred between 2008 and 2009.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

topic.text: 5.1: Impact of Global Economic and Technological Forces
